name: SWiTCH (Behindstabby)
description:
SWiTCH takes place in the far flung future. The Imperial Legion holds a threatening grip over much of the galaxy, which has recently been bolstered by the addition of a deadly superweapon. Although the Confederacy has found the location of this superweapon, they do not have enough time to destroy it before the Imperial Legion are able to fire it. You’re the pilot of an experimental strike vessel, capable of winking back and forth through time at will. The technology is a gamble, however do you have another option at this point?

In SWiTCH, you’ll be continuously be teleporting back and forth between two separate points in time. The present, marked in red, and the past, marked in green.

A* (By Aron Granberg) https://arongranberg.com/astar/

SFXR (By DrPetter) http://www.drpetter.se/project_sfxr.html

The singleplayer is bugged and can't be finished. Please play arena mode.
